snippet: We are informed that when the Advance and Rescue were liberated from the ice, after their confinement of nine months, a fresh gale wafted them along at a rapid rate, and there being considerable sea on at the time, almost every person on board was...
lead_paragraph: We are informed that when the Advance and Rescue were liberated from the ice, after their confinement of nine months, a fresh gale wafted them along at a rapid rate, and there being considerable sea on at the time, almost every person on board was taken sea-sick; "old salts" who had braved the storms of the trackless ocean for many years were among the worst sufferes.

headline.main: THE ARCTIC EXPEDITION.; The Adventures of the Advance.
